pullRequest.title: Update ExtensionSchemaValidationCmdLineApp with more validations
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add following validations for extension schemas

The extension schema name has to follow the naming convention - 'baseSchemaName' + "Extensions"
The extension schema can only include base schema
The extension schema's fields can only be Typeref or array of Typeref
The extension schema's field's annotation - versionSuffix value has to match the versionSuffix value in "resourceKey" annotation.

And tests

nodes.bodyText: make new lines at each of the new files
Maybe give some hint in the beginning, just like the previous parseexception, so when see the log, we know clearly this is from extension schema validator

If we can add a comment say this is valid or not valid, then it is better,
or we can use the name of the extension schema directly to tell it is valid or not valid.
